name: fly
description:
This simulation game allows players to simulate the operation of drones, with simple left and right operations that are easy to navigate but difficult to refine, constantly becoming proficient and challenging their limits!

It is a drone flight simulation practice game, with very realistic game scenes that give you a visual shock. At the same time, the game controls are also very user-friendly. If you like drones but have not tried how to operate them, it can lay the foundation for using real drones in the future.

A very fun drone driving simulation game, where players can freely manipulate drones, hone their operating skills, and enjoy the most authentic drone driving fun!
